wiki.content:
Powrful, gut-wrenching lyrics and tempo makes one stop and think about ones love relationship.  With the inclusion of several mixed musical metaphors the song paints a picture of the many-sided emotions running through the heart.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
